txt.en: Scrapper Carrying Chickens can be bartered for Hobnanigans Tokens or Buried Treasure Tokens during the events.\n\nYou should use a Scrapper Carrying Chicken many times to accomplish this deed.
Scrapper Carrying Chickens can be bartered for Hobnanigans Tokens or Buried Treasure Tokens during the events.\n\nYou should use a Scrapper Carrying Chicken many times to accomplish this deed.
'A bird in the hand is worth... how did it go, again?' - Wald Sandson
